thread.title: Ron & Melissa
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Ron & Melissa

author: Ron & Melissa
title: Ron & Melissa
text:
Stephanie was the sales rep we interacted with at the Lewisville, TX store. She was very professional and great to work with. If she did not know the answer she would go and get it quickly. I will definitely come here again if you have more staff like her.
Thanks!
Ron & Melissa Green
